page.title: 04OCCUPATIONS IN BISHOP BURTON
page.content:
Occupations of people resident in the village fall into 3 broad categories:
1. Those people who live in the village and work in or around the village. These are mainly{farmers and {farmworkers. Some do domestic work. There are very few who fall into this category.
2. People who live in the village but {commute to work}in outside towns such as Beverley, Hull or York. This represents the majority of people in Bishop Burton.
3. People who live outside the village but work within it. They are mostly connected with the{Agricultural {College,}their work ranging from lecturing to gardening to catering.
